overview: This silent film is from a body of work made in the film maker's home during the Covid-19 pandemic when he found it difficult to make other work due to social distancing.  The work consists of films of the walls of the interior of his house, or views of the outside world filmed through windows of the house. This is a short time lapse film showing the movement of areas of light and shadows across a wall in the corner of a room over a period of several hours.
title: Light on a wall 2
